extends Object
implements CommandRunner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultCommandRunner(ExecutionContext context)
      This CommandRunner will run all commands on the same thread.
      DefaultCommandRunner(ExecutionContext context, ListeningExecutorService listeningExecutorService) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListeningExecutorService getListeningExecutorService() 
      void runCommand(Command command)
      Note that this method blocks until the specified command terminates.
      <T> ListenableFuture<T> runCommandsAndYieldResult(List<Command> commands, Callable<T> interpretResults)
      In a new thread, executes of the list of commands and then invokes interpretResults to return a value that represents the output of the commands.
      void runCommandsInParallelAndWait(List<Command> commands)
      Run multiple commands in parallel and block waiting for all of them to finish.

      • runCommandsInParallelAndWait

        public void runCommandsInParallelAndWait(List<Command> commands)
                                  throws CommandFailedException
        Run multiple commands in parallel and block waiting for all of them to finish. An exception is thrown (immediately) if any command fails.
        Parameters:
        commands - List of commands to execute.
        Throws:
        CommandFailedException
